# Project Onboarding Context

## Current Project Status

${project_summary}

## Rules by Domain

${domain_sections}

---

## Onboarding Checklist

Before making changes:
- [ ] Read this file completely
- [ ] Understand the primary architectural decisions (ADRs)
- [ ] Review critical constraints (CONs) for your work area
- [ ] Check system invariants (INVs) to avoid violations
- [ ] Use navigation anchors to jump to relevant domains (e.g., {#authentication})
- [ ] Follow implementation references to locate code, tests, and docs
- [ ] Check relationship cross-references to understand dependencies

---

## Rule Type Legend

- **ADR** (Architectural Decision Record): Core design decisions and rationale
- **CON** (Constraint): Active rules that must be followed during implementation
- **INV** (Invariant): Immutable properties that system must maintain
- **PAT** (Pattern): Reusable architectural patterns and conventions
